peachmix.name: PeachMix
peachmix.subtitle: Online Music Platform
peachmix.description: Web-based music platform that allows users to create sounds using their keyboard or touchscreen. Features optimized audio rendering, a curated collection of playable pop songs, and hidden easter eggs.

marelli.name: Marelli
marelli.subtitle: eCommerce Web App
marelli.description: CRUD E-Commerce app built with React, Google Firebase, and Firestore. Mimics the aesthetic of a luxury e-commerce website.

sort-visualizer.name: Sort Visualizer
sort-visualizer.subtitle: Data Visualization Tool
sort-visualizer.description: An interactive, web-based sorting visualizer demonstrating multiple algorithmic approaches. Made for fun with more to be added.
